ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl

Class EncodingRuleBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.RuleBinding<EncodingRule>
      • ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.EncodingRuleBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EncodingRuleBinding
extends RuleBinding<EncodingRule>
    A RuleBinding that applies to EncodingRules. You can as well just use RuleBinding<EncodingRule>.

    In general there is no need to use this class directly. Instead use the Validation builder classes to generate rules and rule bindings.

    Author:
    Christian Ohr
    See Also:
